TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit Mouse extends System.Object
public ref class Mouse abstract sealed

summary.span: 将鼠标设备表示为特定线程。

span.span: Represents the mouse device to a specific thread.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供鼠标相关的事件，方法和属性，提供有关鼠标状态的信息。The class provides mouse related events, methods and, properties which provide information regarding the state of the mouse. 每个事件的定义为附加的事件还会重新显示由基元素类和作为新的路由事件。Each event that defines as an attached event is also re-exposed by the base element classes and as a new routed event. 通常情况下，它是更方便地处理的应用程序的鼠标事件并，而不是使用事件。Generally, it is more convenient to handle mouse events for an application on and , rather than using the events. 有关详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For details, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 静态成员主类委托的调用线程的输入管理器。The static members of the class delegate to the primary of the calling thread's input manager.

summary.span: 将鼠标输入捕获到指定元素。

span.span: Captures mouse input to the specified element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在元素捕获鼠标，它会接收鼠标输入，指示光标在其边框内。When an element captures the mouse, it receives mouse input whether or not the cursor is within its borders. 如果未指定，默认值是。If a is not specified, the default is . 若要释放鼠标捕获，请调用传递`null`作为要捕获的元素。To release mouse capture, call passing `null` as the element to capture. 如果捕获了鼠标时或引发事件，并输入不会转入下鼠标，元素和首先引发。If the mouse is captured when a or event is raised and the input is not going to the element underneath the mouse, and are raised first. 这使捕获的元素在有机会释放之前捕获和事件进行路由。This enables the captured element a chance to release capture before the and events are routed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在元素捕获鼠标，它会接收鼠标输入，指示光标在其边框内。When an element captures the mouse, it receives mouse input whether or not the cursor is within its borders. 如果未指定，默认值是。If a is not specified, the default is . 若要释放鼠标捕获，请调用传递`null`作为要捕获的元素。To release mouse capture, call passing `null` as the element to capture. 如果捕获了鼠标时或引发事件，并输入不会转入下鼠标，元素和首先引发。If the mouse is captured when a or event is raised and the input is not going to the element underneath the mouse, and are raised first. 这使捕获的元素在有机会释放之前捕获和事件进行路由。This enables the captured element a chance to release capture before the and events are routed. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用捕获到的特定元素鼠标方法。The following example shows how to capture the mouse to a specific element by using the method. [!code-csharp[MouseCaptureSample#MouseCapturSampleCaptureElement](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MouseCaptureSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#mousecaptursamplecaptureelement)] [!code-vb[MouseCaptureSample#MouseCapturSampleCaptureElement](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MouseCaptureSample/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#mousecaptursamplecaptureelement)]

returns.span: 如果元素能够捕获鼠标，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the element was able to capture the mouse; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在元素捕获鼠标，它会接收鼠标输入，游标是否位于其边框内。When an element captures the mouse, it receives mouse input whether the cursor is within its borders. 若要释放鼠标捕获，请调用传递`null`作为要捕获的元素。To release mouse capture, call passing `null` as the element to capture. 如果捕获了鼠标时或引发事件，并输入不会转入下鼠标，元素和首先引发。If the mouse is captured when a or event is raised and the input is not going to the element underneath the mouse, and are raised first. 这使捕获的元素在有机会释放之前捕获和事件进行路由。This enables the captured element a chance to release capture before the and events are routed. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用捕获到的特定元素鼠标方法。The following example shows how to capture the mouse to a specific element by using the method. [!code-csharp[MouseCaptureSample#MouseCapturSampleCaptureElement](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MouseCaptureSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#mousecaptursamplecaptureelement)] [!code-vb[MouseCaptureSample#MouseCapturSampleCaptureElement](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MouseCaptureSample/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#mousecaptursamplecaptureelement)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Captured As IInputElement
public: static property System::Windows::IInputElement ^ Captured { System::Windows::IInputElement ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取捕获了鼠标的元素。

span.span: Gets the element that has captured the mouse.
The element captured by the mouse.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在元素捕获鼠标，它会接收鼠标输入，指示光标在其边框内。When an element captures the mouse, it receives mouse input whether or not the cursor is within its borders. 鼠标通常被捕获以这种方式仅在拖放操作，并捕获之前发生拖放操作的状态将保持。The mouse is typically captured in this manner only during drag-and-drop operations, and retains capture until the drop action of the drag-and-drop operation occurs. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何获取具有鼠标捕获的元素。The follow example shows how to obtain the element that has mouse capture. [!code-csharp[mousecapturesample#MouseCaptureMouseCaptured](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MouseCaptureSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#mousecapturemousecaptured)] [!code-vb[mousecapturesample#MouseCaptureMouseCaptured](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MouseCaptureSample/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#mousecapturemousecaptured)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property DirectlyOver As IInputElement
public: static property System::Windows::IInputElement ^ DirectlyOver { System::Windows::IInputElement ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取鼠标指针正好悬停于的元素。

span.span: Gets the element the mouse pointer is directly over.
The element the mouse pointer is over.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件可以由多个元素组成。Controls can be composed of multiple elements. 报告在鼠标指针位于复合控件和控件本身的特定元素。 reports the specific element in the composite control the mouse pointer is over and not the control itself. 例如，具体取决于哪一部分鼠标指针位于属性可报告的属性或。For example, depending on which part of a the pointer is over, the property could report the of the property or the . 使用上的属性和以确定鼠标是否位于元素，其中包括其可视子元素或控件复合元素。Use the property on and to determine whether the mouse is over an element, which includes its visual child elements or control compositing elements. 如果元素具有鼠标捕获，鼠标指针被视为直接通过该元素中，无论在鼠标指针位于。If an element has mouse capture, the mouse pointer is considered directly over the element regardless of the where the mouse pointer is.

param.span: 计算鼠标在其中的位置的坐标空间。

span.span: The coordinate space in which to calculate the position of the mouse.

summary.span: 获取与指定元素相对的鼠标位置。

span.span: Gets the position of the mouse relative to a specified element.

returns.span: 与参数 相对的鼠标位置。

span.span: The position of the mouse relative to the parameter .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 鼠标指针的位置计算相对于指定元素与元素可为 0，0 原点的点的左上角。The position of the mouse pointer is calculated relative to the specified element with the upper-left corner of element being the point of origin, 0,0. 在拖放操作期间鼠标的位置无法可靠地确定通过。During drag-and-drop operations, the position of the mouse cannot be reliably determined through . 这是因为在放置操作完成，其中许多由基础控制的行为之前，鼠标 （可能包括捕获） 的控制由拖动源元素[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)]调用。This is because control of the mouse (possibly including capture) is held by the originating element of the drag until the drop is completed, with much of the behavior controlled by underlying [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] calls. 改为尝试以下方法：Try the following approaches instead: - 调用方法传递给拖动事件 (， ， )。Call the method of the that is passed to the drag events (, , ). - 调用[GetCursorPos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/winui/winui/windowsuserinterface/resources/cursors/cursorreference/cursorfunctions/getcursorpos.asp)，使用 P/Invoke。Call [GetCursorPos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/winui/winui/windowsuserinterface/resources/cursors/cursorreference/cursorfunctions/getcursorpos.asp), using P/Invoke. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用以确定鼠标指针的位置。The following example shows how to use to determine the position of the mouse pointer. 鼠标指针的位置存储在结构。The position of the mouse pointer is stored in a structure. 并的值中显示对象。The and values of the object are displayed in a . [!code-csharp[MouseRelatedSnippets#MouseRelatedSnippetsPositionMouse](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MouseRelatedSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#mouserelatedsnippetspositionmouse)] [!code-vb[MouseRelatedSnippets#MouseRelatedSnippetsPositionMouse](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MouseRelatedSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#mouserelatedsnippetspositionmouse)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.RoutedEvent GotMouseCaptureEvent
Public Shared ReadOnly GotMouseCaptureEvent As RoutedEvent

summary.span: 标识 附加事件。

span.span: Identifies the attached event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在注册路由的事件，并将结果存储为注册路由的事件的类上的字段时，创建路由的事件标识符。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered, and the result is stored as a field on the class that registers the routed event. 这些标识符包含标识名称、 所有者类型、 处理程序类型、 路由策略和用于添加事件所有者的实用工具方法。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and a utility method for adding owners for the event. 您经常使用这些标识符作为事件系统方法的参数来标识特定路由的事件。You often use these identifiers as parameters to event system methods, to identify a particular routed event.

summary.span: 标识 附加事件。

span.span: Identifies the attached event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在注册路由的事件，并将结果存储为注册路由的事件的类上的字段时，创建路由的事件标识符。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered, and the result is stored as a field on the class that registers the routed event. 这些标识符包含标识名称、 所有者类型、 处理程序类型、 路由策略和用于添加事件所有者的实用工具方法。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and a utility method for adding owners for the event. 您经常使用这些标识符作为事件系统方法的参数来标识特定路由的事件。You often use these identifiers as parameters to event system methods, to identify a particular routed event.

summary.span: 代表鼠标滚轮要滚过一行而转动的单位数。

span.span: Represents the number of units the mouse wheel is rotated to scroll one line.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在当前[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]，此字段的值为 120。In the current [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)], the value of this field is 120. 公开此字段的目的是为了让供应商来构建可以更好地解析鼠标滚轮在将来，可能包括不带齿格自由地旋转滚轮。The intention of the field exposure is to allow for vendors to build finer-resolution mouse wheels in the future, that perhaps would include a freely rotating wheel without notches. 预期结果是此类设备将在每个邮件中发送更多消息，每次旋转，但具有较小的值。The expectation is that such a device would send more messages per rotation, but with a smaller value in each message. 若要支持这种可能性，应添加到传入的增量值量达到 （因此，对于增量旋转您获取相同的响应），或者滚动以响应更频繁的消息的一部分行。To support this possibility, you should either add the incoming delta values until the amount is reached (so for a delta-rotation you get the same response), or scroll partial lines in response to the more frequent messages. 也可以选择自己滚动粒度并累积您自己选择的增量数据，直到该增量，达到时，或可能是引用鼠标灵敏度的用户可以控制系统参数并推断其与鼠标滚轮增量阈值。You could also choose your own scroll granularity and accumulate deltas of your own choosing until that delta is reached, or perhaps reference user-controllable system parameters for mouse sensitivity and extrapolate these to mouse wheel delta thresholds.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Windows.Input.Cursor OverrideCursor { get; set; }
Public Shared Property OverrideCursor As Cursor
public: static property System::Windows::Input::Cursor ^ OverrideCursor { System::Windows::Input::Cursor ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Input::Cursor ^ value); };
member this.OverrideCursor : System.Windows.Input.Cursor with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置整个应用程序的光标。

span.span: Gets or sets the cursor for the entire application.

value.span: 重写的光标，如果没有设置 ，则为 。

span.span: The override cursor or if the is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的是设置为将应用于整个应用程序。The that is set to will be applied to the whole application. 若要清除重写，将到`null`。To clear the override , set to `null`. 设置到将强制鼠标光标不显示，但仍会处理鼠标事件。Setting to will force the mouse cursor not to be displayed, but mouse events are still processed. ## Examples 下面的示例演示的事件处理程序用于切换的单个元素和整个应用程序之间的光标更改作用域。The following example shows an event handler for a that is used to toggle the scope of a cursor change between a single element and the entire application. 如果控件引发事件`rbScopeElement` ，设置一个标志，指示范围的游标更改并设置为`null`。If the control that raised the event is the `rbScopeElement`, a flag that denotes the scope of the cursor change is set and is set to `null`. 如果控件引发事件`rbScopeApplication` ，设置一个标志，指示范围的光标更改并设置为属性控件命名为`DisplayArea`。If the control that raised the event is the `rbScopeApplication`, a flag that denotes the scope of the cursor change is set and is set to the property of the control named `DisplayArea`. [!code-csharp[cursors#CursorsSampleOverrideCursor](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/cursors/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#cursorssampleoverridecursor)] [!code-vb[cursors#CursorsSampleOverrideCursor](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/cursors/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#cursorssampleoverridecursor)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property RightButton As MouseButtonState
public: static property System::Windows::Input::MouseButtonState RightButton { System::Windows::Input::MouseButtonState get(); };

summary.span: 获取鼠标右键的状态。

span.span: Gets the state of the right button.
The state of the right mouse button.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何确定通过检查是否按下鼠标右键的状态等同于枚举值。The following example shows how to determine whether the right mouse button is pressed by checking if the state of the is equal to the enumeration value . 如果按下按钮时，哪些更新显示在此示例中的元素调用的方法。If the button is pressed, a method is called which updates display elements in the sample. MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig bool SetCursor(class System.Windows.Input.Cursor cursor) cil managed

param.name: cursor
param.span: 要将鼠标指针设置为的光标。

span.span: The cursor to set the mouse pointer to.

summary.span: 将鼠标指针设置到指定的 。

span.span: Sets the mouse pointer to the specified .

returns.span: 如果设置了光标，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: , if the cursor was set; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 正在设置光标不适用于任何特定的元素，但它而不是适用于整个应用程序。The cursor being set does not apply to any particular element, but rather it applies to the whole application. 因此，如果后设置鼠标指针移动到的对象设置光标的光标，光标将再次更改。So, if after setting the cursor the mouse pointer moves over an object which sets the cursor, the cursor will be changed again. 若要强制鼠标指针指向特定以及强制这上的所有元素，设置属性。To force the mouse pointer to a specific and to force this on all elements, set the property. 若要设置特定元素的光标，请使用上的属性或。To set the cursor on a specific element, use the property on either or . 有关基元素的详细信息，请参阅[基元素概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/base-elements-overview.md)。For more information on the base elements, see the [Base Elements Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/base-elements-overview.md).
